Topic.Title: Maps: Deleting the space in between and 3D

Posts.EditableText:
Hi there,  how can I make the space between rooms disappears in the Quest map, i mean, no lines connecting them like a blueprint of a building?

And talking about maps, trying to be ambitious here.  Is it possible to create a 3d map? meaning that you can see two diferent or three diferent floors at the same time? I know it won't be easy.

Thanks,
Posts.HTML:
Hi there, how can I make the space between rooms disappears in the Quest map, i mean, no lines connecting them like a blueprint of a building?

And talking about maps, trying to be ambitious here. Is it possible to create a 3d map? meaning that you can see two diferent or three diferent floors at the same time? I know it won't be easy.

Thanks,

Posts.EditableText:
To do the first, set your exit lengths to 0.

For the second, it sort of supports it. Just use up and down exits (but to a max of 3 in each direction).
Posts.HTML:
